Introduction to Economics.name: Price Elasticity of Demand
Introduction to Economics.formula: E_d = \frac{\% \Delta Q_d}{\% \Delta P} = \frac{\Delta Q_d / Q_d}{\Delta P / P}
Introduction to Economics.description: Measures responsiveness of quantity demanded to changes in price.

Introduction to Economics.name: Income Elasticity of Demand
Introduction to Economics.formula: E_y = \frac{\% \Delta Q_d}{\% \Delta Y} = \frac{\Delta Q_d / Q_d}{\Delta Y / Y}
Introduction to Economics.description: Measures responsiveness of quantity demanded to changes in income.

Introduction to Economics.name: Cross-Price Elasticity of Demand
Introduction to Economics.formula: E_{xy} = \frac{\% \Delta Q_x}{\% \Delta P_y} = \frac{\Delta Q_x / Q_x}{\Delta P_y / P_y}

variables.\\Delta Q_x: Change in quantity demanded of good X
variables.Q_x: Initial quantity demanded of good X
variables.\\Delta P_y: Change in price of good Y

Introduction to Economics.description: Measures how demand for one good responds to price changes of another good.

Introduction to Economics.name: Price Elasticity of Supply
Introduction to Economics.formula: E_s = \frac{\% \Delta Q_s}{\% \Delta P} = \frac{\Delta Q_s / Q_s}{\Delta P / P}
Introduction to Economics.description: Measures responsiveness of quantity supplied to changes in price.
